mapper.select: SELECT pd.pdSeq ,pd.pdName ,pd.pdPrice ,pd.pdUseNy ,pd.pdDelNy ,pd.pdDate ,pd.pdFixDate ,pd.pdDesc ,pd.pdType ,pd.pdMeat ,wh.whSeq ,path FROM product pd LEFT JOIN wishlist wh ON pd.pdSeq = wh.product_pdSeq LEFT JOIN insertuploaded ON pd.pdSeq = pSeq AND defaultNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY pd.pdSeq Desc limit 3

SELECT pd.pdSeq ,pd.pdName ,pd.pdPrice ,pd.pdUseNy ,pd.pdDelNy ,pd.pdDate ,pd.pdFixDate ,pd.pdDesc ,pd.pdType ,pd.pdMeat ,wh.whSeq ,path FROM product pd LEFT JOIN wishlist wh ON pd.pdSeq = wh.product_pdSeq LEFT JOIN insertuploaded ON pd.pdSeq = pSeq AND defaultNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY pd.pdSeq limit 3

SELECT rv.rvSeq ,rv.rvRank ,rv.rvComment ,rv.rvUseNy ,rv.rvDelNy ,rv.rvDate ,rv.rvFixDate ,rv.product_pdSeq ,rv.member_mmSeq ,mm.mmSeq ,mm.mmRealName ,pd.pdSeq ,pd.pdName ,path FROM review rv LEFT JOIN member mm ON rv.member_mmSeq = mm.mmSeq LEFT JOIN product pd ON rv.product_pdSeq = pd.pdSeq LEFT JOIN insertUploaded ON pd.pdSeq = pSeq WHERE 1=1 AND defaultNy=1 AND rvRank=5 limit 3
